attributes.action: Listen to what the people voted for in 2016 or see the end to the Tories.
attributes.background: 2016 saw the biggest mandate in UK history. This mandate was to leave the EU. The government are dangerously close to betraying what we voted for. If that happens, we the undersigned will personally ensure that the Tories will never see the seat of power for decades to come. Be warned!

rejection.details:
You might want to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/243319
